author: publisher5
title: South Western Railway Recruitment 2017 – Cultural Quota Posts

organizations.name: apo/ rectt/ south western railway/ ubl

text: South Western Railway Recruitment 2017 – Cultural Quota Posts South Western Railway Recruitment 2017 – Cultural Quota Posts: South Western Railway has invited applications for the recruitment of Group C against Cultural Quota. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format on or before 30-01-2017 by 18:00 hrs. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… South Western Railway Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 02 Name of the Quota: Cultural Quota Name of the Discipline: 1. Violin (Carnatic Style): 01 Post 2. Tabla (Classical): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 18- 29 years as on 01-01-2017 ( must have been born not earlier than 2nd January 1998 and not later than 1st January, 1999). Upper age limit is relaxable as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should have passed 12th or equivalent examination with 50% marks or Matriculation completed Act Apprenticeship/ ITI with 50% marks with professional qualification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test & assessment of talent in the relevant field.. Examination Fee: Candidates should pay Rs.500/- (Rs. 250/- for SC/ ST/ Ex-Servicemen/ Person with disabilities Women, Minorities and Economically Backward Classes) in the form of crossed Indian Postal Order (IPO) only, from any Post office drawn in favour of APO/ Rectt/ South Western Railway/ UBL payable at Hubli. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can submit their applications along with self attested/ attested copies of Certificates in proof of academic qualification, Date of Birth, Sports achievements, community certificate, fee, two photographs one affixed/ pasted in a cover su” to The Assistant Personnel Officer/ Recruitment, Railway Recruitment Cell, South Western Railway, 2nd Floor, Old General Manager’s Office Complex, Club Road, Hubli-580 023 on or before 30-01-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Applications: 30-01-2017. For more details like instructions, pay scale, measurements, exam details & other information click on link given below…
